title: @RIOT why does every melee carry have to have extremely high single target damage?
body:
Why can't we have a melee carry who's whole thing is **"Lots of aoe damage"**, rather than **"I'm a super duper duelist and I blow you up fast"**

I mean look at these abilities and passives:

35% crit chance and 25-60 ad
80% attack speed, half a free auto every 3 attacks and +10% ad + true damage on hit
35 ad, 120% attack speed
double crit (albeit -10% damage) and penetrate half of enemy bonus armor

Its all single target stuff that makes these champions great in duels. Why can't we have like a mallet wielding aoe based melee carry, with comparatively terrible single target damage and who is terrible in duels but with twitch-ult level aoe that can tear a team down as fast as fiddle if he is allowed free reign?

Hydra is only 60-20% attack damage bonus damage based on distance from the wielder, so even with 400 ad it is only 240 to 80 damage per auto and hardly enough aoe damage to compare with rumble or twitch or fiddles.

I want an AOE based physical sustained damage melee carry. Why does every melee carry have to be a duelist? Its so boring.
